item.title: Cool Hacker Tools -- Git
item.description: This blog post seriesâ€™ goal is to provide a comprehensive list of tools I use and how to set them up. When I first started programming, I was so curious to try the coolest gadgets and try new editors, window managers, and programming languages. This blog postâ€™s goal is to try to share as much information that I have with you, either a complete beginner, looking to increase your productivity and to make your stuff look really cool, or an experienced developer looking to add a few tools to your arsenal.
